document.full_text: if the m.l.s. season opener between los angeles and seattle on tuesday was an average match in the league, what do the game statistics tell us about the league compared to some of the top european leagues?
document.title: soccer made in the u.s.: where m.l.s. stands, soccermetrically speaking?
